en_question:
There is a truck available for transporting cargo, and there are 4 types of goods that can be transported with it. The weight, volume, and value of each type of good are shown in Table 7-9. Table 7-9
Item IDWeight (t)Volume (m³)Value (thousand yuan)
1223
2324
3425
4536
The truck has a maximum weight capacity of 15 tons and a maximum volume capacity of 10 cubic meters. Under these constraints, there is no limit on the number of items of each type that can be loaded. Question: How should the four types of goods be combined to maximize the total value of the cargo per truckload?
cn_question:
7.20设有一辆载重卡车，现有 4 种货物均可用此车运输。已知这 4 种货物的重量、容积及价值关系如表7-9所示。 表7-9
货物代号重量/t容积/m^3价值/千元
1223
2324
3425
4536
若该卡车的最大载重为 $15\,\mathrm{~t~}$ ,最大允许装载容积为 $10\,\mathrm{\,m^{3}}$ ,在许可的条件下，每车装载每一种货物的件数不限。问应如何搭配这四种货物.才能使每车装载货物的价值最大?
